changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE profile_keyword ADD id bigint;
ALTER TABLE profile_keyword ADD visibility VARCHAR(19);
ALTER TABLE profile_keyword ADD source_id VARCHAR(19)
ALTER TABLE profile_keyword ADD client_source_id VARCHAR(20)
ALTER TABLE profile_keyword ADD CONSTRAINT keyword_source_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES profile(orcid)
ALTER TABLE profile_keyword ADD CONSTRAINT keyword_client_source_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (client_source_id) REFERENCES client_details(client_details_id)

changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: UPDATE profile_keyword SET id=nextval('keyword_seq') WHERE id IS NULL;

changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: UPDATE profile_keyword k SET visibility = (SELECT keywords_visibility FROM profile p WHERE k.profile_orcid = p.orcid) WHERE k.visibility is null;

changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: UPDATE profile_keyword a SET source_id = (Select source_id from profile b where a.profile_orcid = b.orcid and b.claimed=true), client_source_id = (Select client_source_id from profile b where a.profile_orcid = b.orcid and b.claimed=false) WHERE a.source_id is null and a.client_source_id is null
